get.summary: Get list of companies connected to bank
get.description: This use case provides a Bank to view the Companies associated with it. A company is said to be associated with a bank when the bank is the one which adds the company. A bank is said to be associated with a company, if the company was added by the bank.

post.description: After logging in, a bank can now ‘Add Company’ whose data it needs to monitor. This creates a Company with the given details. The id, password will be sent to the company through mail enabling the company to login into the product.
